name: pet therapy (itch)
description:
a dog, a frog, a bear, and a fish give life advice

[talk to each of them twice]

aka : things my therapist tells me way too often

just use the arrow keys to walk around and talk to different animals. they all have something important to say.

---------

Created using Bitsy 

Music: "Juicy" by ALBIS

This is the first game I've ever made. Created at 3am
